description: an array containing objects of the found parcel machines

items.description: A parcel machine object detailing information about the parcel machine, such as its name, location, references and info about its carrier

id.description: The numeric ID of this parcel machine

reference.description: The reference of this parcel machine (as referenced to by the carrier)

name.description: The name of this parcel machine

carrier_name.description: The name of the carrier of this parcel machine

carrier_id.description: The numeric ID of the carrier of this parcel machine

carrier_reg_no.description: The business registration number of the carrier of this parcel machine

address_row_1.description: The street address of this parcel machine

city.description: The name of the city of this parcel machine

postcode.description: The postcode of this parcel machine

country.description: The two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) of this parcel machine
